mapper.update: update t_gps set device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, alarm_status = #{alarmStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, speed = #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mileage = #{mileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oil = #{oil,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, speed2 = #{speed2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, signal_status = #{signalStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, io_status = #{ioStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, analog = #{analog,jdbcType=CHAR}, network_signal = #{networkSignal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, satellite_number = #{satelliteNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, db_time = #{dbTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vendor = #{vendor,jdbcType=INTEGER} where msg_id = #{msgId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select msg_id, device_id, alarm_status, status, longitude, latitude, height, speed, direction, time, mileage, oil, speed2, signal_status, io_status, analog, network_signal, satellite_number, db_time, vendor from t_gps where msg_id = #{msgId,jdbcType=CHAR}

select msg_id, device_id, alarm_status, status, longitude, latitude, height, speed, direction, time, mileage, oil, speed2, signal_status, io_status, analog, network_signal, satellite_number, db_time, vendor from t_gps
mapper.insert: insert into t_gps (msg_id, device_id, alarm_status, status, longitude, latitude, height, speed, direction, time, mileage, oil, speed2, signal_status, io_status, analog, network_signal, satellite_number, db_time, vendor) values (#{msgId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{alarmStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{direction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{oil,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{speed2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{signalStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ioStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{analog,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{networkSignal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{satelliteNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dbTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vendor,jdbcType=INTEGER})
